name: Pengzhan Zhou
content: About me - Pengzhan Zhou Pengzhan ZhouProfessor of Computer Science at Chongqing University Follow Chongqing, China Email ResearchGate Google Scholar ORCIDThis is the homepage of Pengzhan Zhou (Chinese:周鹏展). I am a professor in the College of Computer Science at Chongqing University. I was awarded the Ph.D. degree under the guidance of Prof. Yuanyuan Yang at Stony Brook University. My research interests include internet of things, machine learning, embodied intelligence, and smart home.You may also find me on my Chinese homepage.Welcome to contact me at pzzhou at cqu dot edu dot cn.
